name: E4 on RAP
tagline: Eclipse E4 Running on the Eclipse Remote Application Platform (RAP)
body: Inspired by the many requests to have E4 applications running on RAP, I spent some time hacking on it at EclipseCon resulting in what you see here. At this point it is just a proof of concept and requires some modifications to both RAP and E4, but it does work!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
